name: Elusive Antlers
desc: Spawns orbs of energy nearby every 10s (-10% per stack) , giving +12% movement speed up to 3 (+3 per stack) times for 12s .
notes:
Elusive Antlers is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Seekers of the Storm expansion.
The item increases spawns 1-3 energy orbs every 10 seconds (-10% duration per stack). Energy orbs, when picked up, grant a 12% movement speed increase which can be stacked 3 times (+3 per stack) and lasts for 12 seconds.


== Notes ==
Energy orbs appear a short distance away in the direction that the holder is currently facing. Energy orbs will always appear on the ground, even if the holder is looking up.
Stacking the energy orb buff resets the buff's 12 second duration and further increases movement speed by 12% for each stack. Once 12 seconds pass without picking up another orb, all stacks of the buff are immediately removed.
The orbs have a minimum spawn time of 2 seconds, and cannot be lower than that.
Energy orbs from this item are a very consistent and easy way to help keep the stat buff from  Collector's Compulsion active for as long as possible.
